1: -module(amp_SUITE).
    2: %% @doc Tests for XEP-0079 Advanced Message Processing support
    3: %% @reference <a href="http://xmpp.org/extensions/xep-0079.html">XEP-0079</a>
    4: %% @author <simon.zelazny@erlang-solutions.com>
    5: %% @copyright 2014 Erlang Solutions, Ltd.
    6: %% This work was sponsored by Grindr.com
    7: 
    8: -compile([export_all]).
    9: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   10: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   11: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus_xmlns.hrl").
   12: -include_lib("exml/include/exml.hrl").
   13: 
   14: all() -> [{group, all}].
   15: 
   16: groups() ->
   17:     [{all, [parallel, shuffle],
   18:       [initial_service_discovery_test,
   19:        actions_and_conditions_discovery_test,
   20: 
   21:        unsupported_actions_test,
   22:        unsupported_conditions_test,
   23:        unacceptable_rules_test,
   24: 
   25:        notify_deliver_direct_test,
   26:        notify_deliver_forward_test,
   27:        notify_deliver_none_test,
   28: 
   29:        notify_match_resource_any_test,
   30:        notify_match_resource_exact_test,
   31:        notify_match_resource_other_test,
   32: 
   33:        error_deliver_direct_test,
   34:        error_deliver_forward_test,
   35:        error_deliver_none_test,
   36: 
   37:        error_deliver_doesnt_apply_test,
   38:        last_rule_applies_test
   39:       ]}
   40:     ].
   41: 
   42: 
   43: init_per_suite(C) -> escalus:init_per_suite(C).
   44: end_per_suite(C) -> ok = escalus_fresh:clean(), escalus:end_per_suite(C).
   45: init_per_testcase(Name,C) -> escalus:init_per_testcase(Name,C).
   46: end_per_testcase(Name,C) -> escalus:end_per_testcase(Name,C).
   47: 
   48: initial_service_discovery_test(Config) ->
   49:     escalus:fresh_story(
   50:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
   51:       fun(Alice) ->
   52:               escalus_client:send(Alice, disco_info(Config)),
   53:               Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   54:               escalus:assert(has_feature, [ns_amp()], Response)
   55:       end).
   56: 
   57: actions_and_conditions_discovery_test(Config) ->
   58:     escalus:fresh_story(
   59:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
   60:       fun(Alice) ->
   61:               escalus_client:send(Alice, disco_info_amp_node(Config)),
   62:               Response = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   63:               assert_has_features(Response,
   64:                                   [ns_amp()
   65:                                   ,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp?action=notify">>
   66:                                   ,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp?action=error">>
   67:                                   ,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp?condition=deliver">>
   68:                                   ,<<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp?condition=match-resource">>
   69:                                   ])
   70:       end).
   71: 
   72: 
   73: unsupported_actions_test(Config) ->
   74:     escalus:fresh_story(
   75:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
   76:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   77:               %% given
   78:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{deliver, direct, drop}],  % drop is unsupported
   79:                                    <<"A paradoxical payload!">>),
   80:               %% when
   81:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
   82: 
   83:               % then
   84:               client_receives_error(Alice, {deliver, direct, drop}, <<"unsupported-actions">>)
   85:       end).
   86: 
   87: unsupported_conditions_test(Config) ->
   88:     escalus:fresh_story(
   89:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
   90:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
   91:               %% given
   92:               %% expire-at is unsupported
   93:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{'expire-at', <<"2020-06-06T12:20:20Z">>, notify}],
   94:                                    <<"Never fade away!">>),
   95:               %% when
   96:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
   97: 
   98:               % then
   99:               client_receives_error(Alice, {'expire-at', <<"2020-06-06T12:20:20Z">>, notify},
  100:                                    <<"unsupported-conditions">>)
  101:       end).
  102: 
  103: unacceptable_rules_test(Config) ->
  104:     escalus:fresh_story(
  105:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  106:       fun(Alice, Bob) ->
  107:               %% given
  108:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{broken, rule, spec}
  109:                                         ,{also_broken, rule, spec}
  110:                                         ],
  111:                                    <<"Break all the rules!">>),
  112:               %% when
  113:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  114: 
  115:               % then
  116:               client_receives_error(Alice, [{broken, rule, spec}
  117:                                            ,{also_broken, rule, spec}],
  118:                                     <<"not-acceptable">>)
  119:       end).
  120: 
  121: 
  122: notify_deliver_direct_test(Config) ->
  123:     escalus:fresh_story(
  124:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  125:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  126:               %% given
  127:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{deliver, direct, notify}],
  128:                                 <<"I want to be sure you get this!">>),
  129:               %% when
  130:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  131: 
  132:               % then
  133:               client_receives_notification(Alice, Bob, {deliver, direct, notify}),
  134:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"I want to be sure you get this!">>)
  135:       end).
  136: 
  137: notify_deliver_forward_test(Config) ->
  138:     escalus:fresh_story(
  139:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  140:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  141:               %% given
  142:               BobsBareJid = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  143:               Msg = amp_message_to(BobsBareJid, [{deliver, forward, notify}],
  144:                                    <<"One of your resources needs to get this!">>),
  145:               %% when
  146:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  147: 
  148:               % then
  149:               client_receives_notification(Alice, BobsBareJid, {deliver, forward, notify}),
  150:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"One of your resources needs to get this!">>)
  151:       end).
  152: 
  153: notify_deliver_none_test(Config) ->
  154:     escalus:fresh_story(
  155:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  156:       fun(Alice) ->
  157:               %% given
  158:               StrangerJid = <<"stranger@localhost">>,
  159:               Msg = amp_message_to(StrangerJid, [{deliver, none, notify}],
  160:                                    <<"A message in a bottle...">>),
  161:               %% when
  162:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  163: 
  164:               % then
  165:               client_receives_notification(Alice, StrangerJid, {deliver, none, notify})
  166:       end).
  167: 
  168: notify_match_resource_any_test(Config) ->
  169:     escalus:fresh_story(
  170:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 4}],
  171:       fun(Alice,Bob,_,_,_) ->
  172:               %% given
  173:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{'match-resource', any, notify}],
  174:                                    <<"Church-encoded hot-dogs">>),
  175:               %% when
  176:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  177: 
  178:               % then
  179:               client_receives_notification(Alice, Bob, {'match-resource', any, notify}),
  180:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"Church-encoded hot-dogs">>)
  181:       end).
  182: 
  183: notify_match_resource_exact_test(Config) ->
  184:     escalus:fresh_story(
  185:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 4}],
  186:       fun(Alice,_,_,Bob3,_) ->
  187:               %% given
  188:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob3, [{'match-resource', exact, notify}],
  189:                                    <<"Resource three, your battery is on fire!">>),
  190:               %% when
  191:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  192: 
  193:               % then
  194:               client_receives_notification(Alice, Bob3, {'match-resource', exact, notify}),
  195:               client_receives_message(Bob3, <<"Resource three, your battery is on fire!">>)
  196:       end).
  197: 
  198: notify_match_resource_other_test(Config) ->
  199:     escalus:fresh_story(
  200:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  201:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  202:               %% given
  203:               NonmatchingJid = << (escalus_client:short_jid(Bob))/binary,
  204:                                   "/blahblahblah_resource" >>,
  205:               Msg = amp_message_to(NonmatchingJid,
  206:                                    [{'match-resource', other, notify}],
  207:                                     <<"A Bob by any other name!">>),
  208: 
  209:               %% when
  210:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  211: 
  212:               % then
  213:               client_receives_notification(Alice, NonmatchingJid, {'match-resource', other, notify}),
  214:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"A Bob by any other name!">>)
  215:       end).
  216: 
  217: error_deliver_direct_test(Config) ->
  218:     escalus:fresh_story(
  219:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  220:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  221:               %% given
  222:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{deliver, direct, error}],
  223:                                    <<"I want to be sure you don't get this!">>),
  224:               %% when
  225:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  226: 
  227:               % then
  228:               client_receives_error(Alice, Bob, {deliver, direct, error}, <<"undefined-condition">>),
  229:               client_receives_nothing(Bob)
  230:       end).
  231: 
  232: error_deliver_forward_test(Config) ->
  233:     escalus:fresh_story(
  234:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  235:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  236:               %% given
  237:               BobsBareJid = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  238:               Msg = amp_message_to(BobsBareJid, [{deliver, forward, error}],
  239:                                    <<"This cannot be forwarded!">>),
  240:               %% when
  241:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  242: 
  243:               % then
  244:               client_receives_error(Alice, BobsBareJid, {deliver, forward, error}, <<"undefined-condition">>),
  245:               client_receives_nothing(Bob)
  246:       end).
  247: 
  248: error_deliver_none_test(Config) ->
  249:     escalus:fresh_story(
  250:       Config, [{alice, 1}],
  251:       fun(Alice) ->
  252:               %% given
  253:               StrangerJid = <<"stranger@localhost">>,
  254:               Msg = amp_message_to(StrangerJid, [{deliver, none, error}],
  255:                                    <<"This cannot possibly succeed">>),
  256:               %% when
  257:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  258: 
  259:               % then
  260:               client_receives_error(Alice, StrangerJid, {deliver, none, error}, <<"undefined-condition">>)
  261:       end).
  262: 
  263: error_deliver_doesnt_apply_test(Config) ->
  264:     escalus:fresh_story(
  265:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  266:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  267:               %% given
  268:               Msg = amp_message_to(Bob, [{deliver, none, error}],
  269:                                    <<"Hello, Bob!">>),
  270:               %% when
  271:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  272: 
  273:               % then
  274:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"Hello, Bob!">>),
  275:               client_receives_nothing(Alice)
  276:       end).
  277: 
  278: 
  279: last_rule_applies_test(Config) ->
  280:     escalus:fresh_story(
  281:       Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
  282:       fun(Alice,Bob) ->
  283:               %% given
  284:               BobsBareJid = escalus_client:short_jid(Bob),
  285:               Msg = amp_message_to(BobsBareJid, [{deliver, direct, error},
  286:                                                  {deliver, none, error},
  287:                                                  {deliver, forward, notify}],
  288:                                    <<"One of your resources needs to get this!">>),
  289:               %% when
  290:               client_sends_message(Alice, Msg),
  291: 
  292:               % then
  293:               client_receives_notification(Alice, BobsBareJid, {deliver, forward, notify}),
  294:               client_receives_message(Bob, <<"One of your resources needs to get this!">>)
  295:       end).
  296: 
  297: 
  298: 
  299: %% Internal
  300: ns_amp() ->
  301:     <<"http://jabber.org/protocol/amp">>.
  302: 
  303: client_goes_offline(Client) ->
  304:     escalus_client:stop(Client).
  305: 
  306: client_sends_message(Client, Msg) ->
  307:     escalus_client:send(Client, Msg).
  308: 
  309: client_receives_error(Client, Rules, AmpErrorKind) when is_list(Rules) ->
  310:     Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  311:     assert_amp_error(Client, Received, Rules, AmpErrorKind);
  312: client_receives_error(Client, Rule, AmpErrorKind) ->
  313:     client_receives_error(Client, [Rule], AmpErrorKind).
  314: 
  315: client_receives_error(Client, IntendedRecipient, Rule, AmpErrorKind) ->
  316:     Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  317:     assert_amp_error_with_full_amp(Client, IntendedRecipient,
  318:                                    Received, Rule, AmpErrorKind).
  319: client_receives_nothing(Client) ->
  320:     timer:sleep(300),
  321:     escalus_assert:has_no_stanzas(Client).
  322: 
  323: client_receives_message(Client, MsgText) ->
  324:     Received = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  325:     escalus:assert(is_chat_message, [MsgText], Received).
  326: 
  327: client_receives_notification(Client, IntendedRecipient, Rule) ->
  328:     Msg = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Client),
  329:     assert_notification(Client, IntendedRecipient, Msg, Rule).
  330: 
  331: disco_info(Config) ->
  332:     Server = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  333:     escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server).
  334: disco_info_amp_node(Config) ->
  335:     Server = escalus_config:get_config(ejabberd_domain, Config),
  336:     escalus_stanza:disco_info(Server, ns_amp()).
  337: 
  338: assert_amp_error(Client, Response, Rules, AmpErrorKind) when is_list(Rules) ->
  339:     ClientJID = escalus_client:full_jid(Client),
  340:     Server = escalus_client:server(Client),
  341:     Server = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"from">>),
  342:     ClientJID = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"to">>),
  343:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp/5,
  344:                    [amp_status_attr(AmpErrorKind), no_to_attr, no_from_attr, Rules],
  345:                    Response),
  346:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp_error/3,
  347:                    [AmpErrorKind, Rules],
  348:                    Response);
  349: 
  350: assert_amp_error(Client, Response, Rule, AmpErrorKind) ->
  351:     assert_amp_error(Client, Response, [Rule], AmpErrorKind).
  352: 
  353: assert_amp_error_with_full_amp(Client, IntendedRecipient, Response,
  354:                                {C,V,A} = Rule, AmpErrorKind) ->
  355:     ClientJID = escalus_client:full_jid(Client),
  356:     RecipientJID = full_jid(IntendedRecipient),
  357:     Server = escalus_client:server(Client),
  358:     Server = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"from">>),
  359:     ClientJID = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"to">>),
  360:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp/5,
  361:                    [amp_status_attr(AmpErrorKind), RecipientJID, ClientJID, [Rule]],
  362:                    Response),
  363:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp_error/3,
  364:                    [AmpErrorKind, [Rule]],
  365:                    Response).
  366: 
  367: 
  368: assert_notification(Client, IntendedRecipient, Response, {_C,_V,A} = Rule) ->
  369:     ClientJID = escalus_client:full_jid(Client),
  370:     RecipientJID = full_jid(IntendedRecipient),
  371:     Server = escalus_client:server(Client),
  372:     Action = a2b(A),
  373:     Server = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"from">>),
  374:     ClientJID = exml_query:attr(Response, <<"to">>),
  375:     escalus:assert(fun contains_amp/5,
  376:                    [Action, RecipientJID, ClientJID, [Rule]],
  377:                    Response).
  378: 
  379: assert_has_features(Response, Features) ->
  380:     CheckF = fun(F) -> escalus:assert(has_feature, [F], Response) end,
  381:     lists:foreach(CheckF, Features).
  382: 
  383: full_jid(#client{} = Client) ->
  384:     escalus_client:full_jid(Client);
  385: full_jid(B) when is_binary(B) ->
  386:     B.
  387: 
  388: %% @TODO: Move me out to escalus_stanza %%%%%%%%%
  389: %%%%%%%%% Element constructors %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  390: amp_message_to(To, Rules, MsgText) ->
  391:     Msg0 = #xmlel{children=C} = escalus_stanza:chat_to(To, MsgText),
  392:     Msg = escalus_stanza:set_id(Msg0, escalus_stanza:id()),
  393:     Amp = amp_el(Rules),
  394:     Msg#xmlel{children = C ++ [Amp]}.
  395: 
  396: amp_el([]) ->
  397:     throw("cannot build <amp> with no rules!");
  398: amp_el(Rules) ->
  399:     #xmlel{name = <<"amp">>
  400:           ,attrs = [{<<"xmlns">>, ns_amp()}]
  401:           ,children = [ rule_el(R) || R <- Rules ]
  402:           }.
  403: 
  404: rule_el({Condition, Value, Action}) ->
  405:     check_rules(Condition, Value, Action),
  406:     #xmlel{name = <<"rule">>
  407:           ,attrs = [{<<"condition">>, a2b(Condition)}
  408:                    ,{<<"value">>, a2b(Value)}
  409:                    ,{<<"action">>, a2b(Action)}]}.
  410: 
  411: %% @TODO: Move me out to escalus_pred %%%%%%%%%%%%
  412: %%%%%%%%% XML predicates %%%%% %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  413: contains_amp(Status, To, From, ExpectedRules, Stanza) when is_list(ExpectedRules)->
  414:     Amp = exml_query:subelement(Stanza, <<"amp">>),
  415:     undefined =/= Amp andalso
  416:         To == exml_query:attr(Amp, <<"to">>, no_to_attr) andalso
  417:         From == exml_query:attr(Amp, <<"from">>, no_from_attr) andalso
  418:         Status == exml_query:attr(Amp, <<"status">>, no_status_attr) andalso
  419:         all_present([ rule_el(R) || R <- ExpectedRules ], exml_query:subelements(Amp, <<"rule">>)).
  420: 
  421: contains_amp_error(AmpErrorKind, Rules, Response) ->
  422:     ErrorEl = exml_query:subelement(Response, <<"error">>),
  423:     <<"modify">> == exml_query:attr(ErrorEl, <<"type">>)
  424:         andalso
  425:         amp_error_code(AmpErrorKind) == exml_query:attr(ErrorEl, <<"code">>)
  426:         andalso
  427:         undefined =/= (Marker = exml_query:subelement(ErrorEl, amp_error_marker(AmpErrorKind)))
  428:         andalso
  429:         ns_stanzas() == exml_query:attr(Marker, <<"xmlns">>)
  430:         andalso
  431:         undefined =/= (Container = exml_query:subelement(ErrorEl, amp_error_container(AmpErrorKind)))
  432:         andalso
  433:         all_present([ rule_el(R) || R <- Rules ], exml_query:subelements(Container, <<"rule">>)).
  434: 
  435: all_present(Needles, Haystack) ->
  436:     list_and([ lists:member(Needle, Haystack)
  437:                || Needle <- Needles ]).
  438: 
  439: 
  440: list_and(List) ->
  441:     lists:all(fun(X) -> X =:= true end, List).
  442: 
  443: ns_stanzas() ->
  444:     <<"urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas">>.
  445: 
  446: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  447: 
  448: check_rules(deliver, none, notify) -> ok;
  449: check_rules(deliver, forward, notify) -> ok;
  450: check_rules(deliver, direct, notify) -> ok;
  451: 
  452: check_rules(deliver, direct, error) -> ok;
  453: check_rules(deliver, forward, error) -> ok;
  454: check_rules(deliver, none, error) -> ok;
  455: 
  456: check_rules('match-resource', any, notify) -> ok;
  457: check_rules('match-resource', exact, notify) -> ok;
  458: check_rules('match-resource', other, notify) -> ok;
  459: 
  460: check_rules(deliver, direct, drop) -> ok;        %% for testing unsupported rules
  461: check_rules('expire-at', _binary, notify) -> ok; %% for testing unsupported conditions
  462: check_rules(broken, rule, spec) -> ok;           %% for testing unacceptable rules
  463: check_rules(also_broken, rule, spec) -> ok;      %% for testing unacceptable rules
  464: 
  465: check_rules(C,V,A) -> throw({illegal_amp_rule, {C, V, A}}).
  466: 
  467: a2b(B) when is_binary(B) -> B;
  468: a2b(A) -> atom_to_binary(A, utf8).
  469: 
  470: %% Undefined-condition errors return a fully-fledged amp element with status=error
  471: %% The other errors have 'thin' <amp>s with no status attribute
  472: amp_status_attr(<<"undefined-condition">>) -> <<"error">>;
  473: amp_status_attr(_)                         -> no_status_attr.
  474: 
  475: amp_error_code(<<"undefined-condition">>) -> <<"500">>;
  476: amp_error_code(<<"not-acceptable">>) -> <<"405">>;
  477: amp_error_code(<<"unsupported-actions">>) -> <<"400">>;
  478: amp_error_code(<<"unsupported-conditions">>) -> <<"400">>.
  479: 
  480: amp_error_marker(<<"not-acceptable">>) -> <<"not-acceptable">>;
  481: amp_error_marker(<<"unsupported-actions">>) -> <<"bad-request">>;
  482: amp_error_marker(<<"unsupported-conditions">>) -> <<"bad-request">>;
  483: amp_error_marker(<<"undefined-condition">>) -> <<"undefined-condition">>.
  484: 
  485: amp_error_container(<<"not-acceptable">>) -> <<"invalid-rules">>;
  486: amp_error_container(<<"unsupported-actions">>) -> <<"unsupported-actions">>;
  487: amp_error_container(<<"unsupported-conditions">>) -> <<"unsupported-conditions">>;
  488: amp_error_container(<<"undefined-condition">>) -> <<"failed-rules">>.
